definition: A receptacle designed to hold, organize, or temporarily contain objects or materials.

positive_examples: She packed her lunch in a small plastic container.
The storage compartment under the seat held emergency supplies.
He threw the crumpled paper into the wastebasket by his desk.
The mesh bag allowed air to circulate through the produce.
Books were organized in labeled boxes in the attic.
The toolbox compartment kept screws separate from nails.
negative_examples: The water pipe carried fresh water to the house.
She drank coffee from her favorite ceramic mug.
The freight train transported goods across the country.
He cooked pasta in a large stainless steel pot.
The bottle of wine was opened for dinner.
She served soup in elegant porcelain bowls.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DrinkingVessel, CookingContainer, TransportContainer, DisplayCase
